name: 10s Bar Brawl
description:
You go out to your favorite bar to get your evening drink like every evening. And as usual there are some guys you dont like. The problem is they don't like you either.

Get rid of 'em and get your well deserved drink while dealing with your new backpack the "Gearpacker 3001Tm".

You bought it earlier this day in a dodgy shop close to the Hyperstation without operation manual and no idea how it works. "It's pack and play" the shopkeeper said.

Anyway, this nerve wrecking bagpack changes your goddamn weapon every ten seconds. But you dont have to clean it up anymore. So it was a good deal, right? The only thing you have to clean up is

your bar to get your drink.

Controls

--------

W A S D or Arrow keys to move. Main mouse button to shot.

Credits

-------

- @Singular (Stefan Knetsch): Code / Art / Design / Particle effects

- @BiOs3008 (Grigorios Gkisios): Art / Design / SFX

- @Cedric86 (Cedric Brupbacher): Code / Design / Animation / SFX

- @Meistro (Mamisoa Lin. Schmidt R.): Music / SFX

- @Razor Zorax (Henry Wiesner): Code / Design / SFX

Tools used

----------

- Unity

- Blender

- PhotoShop

- Gimp

- Music Maker

- Visual Studio

- Audacity

Known issues

------------

- No score board available yet.

- Phyisics bugs

- One can hit an shot through walls :D

- Enemy sprite renderer slightly broken

Post Jam Change Log

-------------------

- Nothing yet
